content.raw:
I don't see anything in the original competition description that says we'd be working with Gazebo. It's just the simulation environment. All the work should be in ROS. But as you say, this should have been figured out before Sept. 

It may be that the actual scoring will use the ROS frames. Louise can you say?

This script is just an approximation of the score.

I don't see anything in the original competition description that says we'd be working with Gazebo. It's just the simulation environment. All the work should be in ROS. But as you say, this should have been figured out before Sept.

It may be that the actual scoring will use the ROS frames. Louise can you say?
